title: Review quarterly marketing reports
description: Analyze Q3 performance metrics and prepare insights for the team meeting. Focus on conversion rates and customer acquisition costs.

title: Complete project proposal for client
description: Draft comprehensive proposal including timeline, deliverables, and budget breakdown for the new web application project.

title: Schedule dentist appointment
description: Book routine cleaning and checkup for next month. Prefer morning slots if available.

title: Prepare presentation for stakeholder meeting
description: Create slides covering project progress, upcoming milestones, and resource requirements. Include visual charts and timeline.

title: Research new productivity tools
description: Evaluate task management and collaboration software options for the team. Compare features, pricing, and integration capabilities.

title: Update portfolio website
description: Add recent projects, refresh design elements, and optimize for mobile devices. Update contact information and testimonials.
